author: Kehinde Adewunmi
text:
Pray for people.
You don't know what they're healing from. What I heard today can make you give someone all your money. 
She said she doesn't even have money to go to 3rd Mainland Bridge to jump. Jump?! Why is life so unfair to some?

author: Kehinde Adewunmi
text: I pray God can show me my due date of expiry on this earth than this daily rush like every hour is my last

author: Kehinde Adewunmi
text: Don't make my late uncle turn in his grave against you. Behave yourself sir. Thank you

author: Kehinde Adewunmi
text: And you should know what the Ade in Ade-Akinyemi means. It means Adewunmi. The late uncle Bashir taught me to read the dailies at 8 years of age. My twin would form sleeping to escape knocks on the head. Please ascertain your facts before you tweet sir

author: Kehinde Adewunmi
text: At the last i checked! An uncle of @ProfOsinbajo Dr. Bashir Ade-Akinyemi, of Ige, Adesanya & Akinyemi law firm on Simpson Street, Lagos Island was heavily into NADECO alongside members of the Onasanya family. He contested PDP primaries in Ogun State. Facts before tweets sir 🙏 https://t.co/asy2PPyzkA
